column1: #Text=You know the numbers are suspect.....when the very same report tells you........'
#Text=The Government's net debt (total liabilities less financial assets) stood at $687.0 billion at March 31, 2015, up $4.6 billion from March 31, 2014.'
#Text=Page 24 - http://www.fin.gc.ca/afr-rfa/2015/afr-rfa-eng.pdfIn what kind of fairy tale universe could adding $4.6 billion to the National Debt be construed as having a $1.9 billion surplus ?
